00027 #ifndef _PORTATION_H
00028 #define _PORTATION_H
00029 
00030 #include <ntrxtypes.h>
00031 #include <hwclock.h>
00032 #include <avr/pgmspace.h>
00033 #include <stdio.h>
00034 
00035 #define ReadRomByte(p) pgm_read_byte(&(p))
00036 #define ReadRomWord(p) pgm_read_word(&(p))
00037 
00038 #include <avr/interrupt.h>
00039 #ifndef ENTER_TASK
00040 #define ENTER_TASK cli()
00041 #endif
00042 #ifndef LEAVE_TASK
00043 #define LEAVE_TASK sei()
00044 #endif
00045 
00046 /*This macro should be used for debugging output.*/
00047 #define PRINTF(args, ...)   printf_P(PSTR(args), ##__VA_ARGS__)
00048 
00049 /*This macro should be used to supress debugging output.*/
00050 #define NoDebugging(args, ...)
00051 
00052 
00053 
00054 #endif  /* _PORTATION_H */
